likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the Delayed Transition scenario with a 2.5°C temperature increase and heightened biodiversity loss (0.3), the likelihood of biodiversity loss impacting resource availability for iPhone hardware components is likely to increase due to environmental stress. The potential impact on iPhone hardware operations will rise as well, given the reliance on specific materials that may become scarce or more costly due to biodiversity decline.

emerging_opportunities.description: Developing and using alternative sustainable materials for iPhone components to mitigate resource scarcity.

additional_challenges.description: Increased biodiversity loss could lead to significant disruptions in the supply chains of raw materials necessary for iPhone hardware manufacturing.

mitigation_strategies.description: Expand and diversify the supplier network to include sources that prioritize sustainable practices and biodiversity-friendly materials.
Implement programs that promote recycling and reusing materials from old devices to reduce dependence on new raw materials.
